item.title: CVE-2021-34631|2024-09-17T02:15:47.427Z -- newsplugin -- newsplugin
item.description: The NewsPlugin WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the handle_save_style function found in the ~/news-plugin.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.18.
